articles.title: Mark Cuban to file protest of Mavericks loss to Warriors - ESPN.co.uk
articles.description: The Mavericks will file a protest of Wednesday's loss to the Warriors after what team governor Mark Cuban called "the worst officiating non call mistake possibly in the history of the NBA."
